title: Cabraal steps down as Governor of the Central Bank
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka’s Central Bank Governor Ajith Nivard Cabraal had tendered in his resignation to the President on Monday (4)
In a tweet he said, he decided to resign following the resignation of all the Cabinet Ministers on Sunday (3).
Accept ministerial positions & join to solve crisis; President’s invite to political parties
